mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Navigation.Distributed.XSLT
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Allows visitors to navigate the website via a left or right sidebar navigation menu.
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: Implements a sidebar navigation menu as an XSLT function. Highly customizable via parameters and CSS.
